text: Tse - vony kotri skazaly, "BOH zrobyv domovlenist聞 z namy shcho my ne budemo viryty v bud聞-yakomu kur'yeru, yakshcho ne vin vyroblyaye proponuvannya shcho pryyizhdzhaye spozhytyy vohnem." Skazhit聞, "Kur'yery pered meni prybuly do vas z yasnymy dokazamy, vklyuchayuchy yaki vas til聞ky zazhadaly. Chomu todi vy ubyly yikh, yakshcho vy ye pravdyvi
